              requite
               
              your
               
              loves
              .
               
              So
               
              fare
               
              you
               
              well
              .

speaker: HAMLET
text:
Upon
               
              the
               
              platform
              ,
               
              ’twixt
               
              eleven
               
              and
               
              twelve
              ,

speaker: HAMLET
text:
I’ll
               
              visit
               
              you
              .

speaker: ALL
text:
Our
               
              duty
               
              to
               
              your
               
              Honor
              .

speaker: HAMLET
text:
Your
               
              loves
              ,
               
              as
               
              mine
               
              to
               
              you
              .
               
              Farewell
              .

speaker: HAMLET
text:
My
               
              father’s
               
              spirit
              —
              in
               
              arms
              !
               
              All
               
              is
               
              not
               
              well
              .

speaker: HAMLET
text:
I
               
              doubt
               
              some
               
              foul
               
              play
              .
               
              Would
               
              the
               
              night
               
              were
               
              come
              !

speaker: HAMLET
text:
Till
               
              then
              ,
               
              sit
               
              still
              ,
               
              my
               
              soul
              .
               
              Foul
               
              deeds
               
              will
               
              rise
              ,

speaker: HAMLET
text:
Though
               
              all
               
              the
               
              earth
               
              o’erwhelm
               
              them
              ,
               
              to
               
              men’s
               
              eyes
              .
